english.segment1: Hey Amanda. Where'd you find these crazy boys this time?. They say you're pretty but you don't think they're right.
english.segment2: Hey Amanda. While you're staring at your telephone tonight. do you feel like turning it off, turning off all of the lights?
english.segment3: Pin your wings down. if it's over now. Pin your wings down. just take a chance somehow
english.segment4: Hey Amanda. who just threw your heart away this time?. And when you're crying on your bed does he help keep you alive?
english.segment5: Pin your wings down. if it's all over now. Pin your wings down. just take a chance somehow
english.segment6: I'll take the blame if you take me home now. Cuz there's no place left for trust in all this pain. And you know when it rains in this town I get washed away. Without a sound. So pin my wings down
english.segment7: If it's over. If it's over now
english.segment8: Pin your wings down. if it's over now. Pin your wings down. just take a chance somehow.
